templates.template: <act_window name="${string}" domain="[('${field}', '${condition}', active_id)]" res_model="${res_model}" src_model="${src_model}" id="act_${unique_id}"/>
<button name="${function_name}" states="${state}" string="${string}" type="object" icon="${icon}"/>
<button name='%(${wizard_id})d' type='action' string='${string}' states='${state}' icon="${icon}"/>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_tree_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.tree</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="type">tree</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="${tree_string}"> <field name="name"/> </tree> </field> </record>
<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_form_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.form</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="type">form</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="${form_string}"> <field name="name" select="1"/> </form> </field> </record>
<record model="ir.actions.act_window" id="action_${object_name}_tree_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}</field> <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field> <field name="res_model">${objectname}</field> <!-- <field name="domain">[('field_name','condition',criteria)]</field>--> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">tree,form</field> <field name="view_id" ref="${objectname}_tree_view"/> </record>
<menuitem id="${object_name}_menu" name="${objectname}" parent="${cursor}" action="action_${object_name}_tree_view"/>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_form_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.form</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="type">form</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="${form_string}"> <field name="name" select="1"/> </form> </field> </record>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_form_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.form</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="type">form</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="${view_name}"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="${form_string}"> <field name="${field_name}" position="${position}"/> <field name="${new_field}"/> </form> </field> </record>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_form_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.form</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="type">form</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="${form_string}"> <notebook> <page string="${page_name}"> <field name="name" select="1"/> </page> </notebook> </form> </field> </record>
<menuitem id="${object_name}_menu" name="${objectname}" parent="${cursor}" action="action_${object_name}_tree_view"/>
<menuitem id="${object_name}_menu" name="${object_name}" />

<openerp> <data>
</data> </openerp>
<report id="${id}" model="${objetname}" name="${name}" rml="${path_to_rml}" string="${string}" ${cursor} <!-- auto="False" --> <!-- menu="False" --> <!-- keyword="client_print_multi" --> />

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_tree_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.tree</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="type">tree</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="${tree_string}"> <field name="name"/> </tree> </field> </record>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_tree_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.tree</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="type">tree</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="${view_name}"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="${tree_string}"> <field name="${field_name}" position="${position}"/> <field name="${new_field}"/> </tree> </field> </record>

<record model="ir.actions.act_window" id="action_${object_name}_tree_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}</field> <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field> <field name="res_model">${objectname}</field> <!-- <field name="domain">[('field_name','condition',criteria)]</field>--> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">tree,form</field> <field name="view_id" ref="${object_name}_tree_view"/> </record>
<wizard string="${string}" model="${objectname}" name="${wizard_name}" id="${wizrd_id}" <!--keyword="client_print_multi" --> />
<menuitem action="${wizard_id}" id="${unique_menu_id}" parent="${parent_menu_id}" type="wizard"/>

<record id="act_${statename}" model="workflow.activity"> <field name="wkf_id" ref="wkf"/> <!--<field name="flow_start">True</field>--> <!--<field name="flow_stop">True</field>--> <field name="name">${statename}</field> <field name="action">${function}</field> <field name="kind">function</field> </record>

<record id="${transition_id}" model="workflow.transition"> <field name="act_from" ref="${from_state}"/> <field name="act_to" ref="${to_state}"/> <field name="signal">${signal_name}</field> <!-- <field name="role_id" ref="${role_id}"/> --> <!-- <field name="condition">${condition_function}</field> --> </record>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="${encoding}"?>
<?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="${cursor}"?>
